subject: International Monetary Fund
body:
International Monetary Fund
( I.M.F ) Head Office
Senior Resident Representative
#1900 Pennsylvania Ave NW,
Washington, DC 20431 USA.
(I.M.F)(*2003*).
RESPOND TO OUR OFFICIAL EMAIL(He)
INSTRUCTION / WARNING TO RELEASE YOUR UNPAID FUND (*2003*).
This is to inform you of a very important information which will be of a great help to redeem you from all the difficulties you have been experiencing in getting your long overdue payment, due to excessive demand for money from you by both irrupt Bank officials and Courier Companies after which your funds remain unpaid to you.
I am Ms.Kristalina Georgieva, a highly placed official of the International Monetary Fund (IMF). It may interest you to know that reports have reached our office by so many
correspondences on the uneasy way in which people like you are treated by Various Banks and Courier Companies/ Diplomat across Europe to Africa and Asia /London Uk. We have decided to put a stop to that.
All Governmental and Non-Governmental prostates, NGOs, Finance Companies, Banks,Security Companies and Courier companies which have been in contact with you of late
have been instructed to back off from your transaction and you have been devised NOT to respond to them anymore since the International Monetary Fund (IMF) is now directly in charge of your payment.
Your name appeared in our payment schedule list of beneficiaries that will receive their funds in this first quarter payment of the year because we only transfer funds twice in
a year according to our banking regulation. We apologize for the delay of your payment and please stop communicating with any office now and pay attention to our office payment accordingly.
Now your new Payment,
United Nation Approval No; UN5685P,
White House Approved No: WH44CV,
Reference No.-35460021,
Allocation No: 674632
Password No: 339331,
Pin Code No: 55674 and your
Certificate of Merit Payment No: 103,
Released Code No: 0763;
Immediate (IMF) Telex confirmation No: -1114433;
Secret Code No: XXTN013.
Your payment inheritance fund is USD$1.2 Million. Having received these vital payment numbers, therefore you are qualified now to receive and confirm your payment with the
International Monetary Fund (IMF) immediately. We assure you that your payment will get to you as long as you follow my directives and instructions. We have decided to
give you a CODE, THE CODE IS: (*2003*). Please, any time you receive an email with the me Ms. Kristalina Georgieva, check if there is CODE (*2003*).if the code is not written, please delete the message from your box! You are hereby advised NOT to remit
further payment to any institutions with respect to your transaction as your fund will be transferred to you directly from our source. I hope this is clear. Any action contrary to this instruction is at your own risk. Respond to this email with immediate effect and we shall give you further details on how your fund will be released.
This Office hereby gives you the GUARANTEE your absolute protection and that of your approved Compensation Funds via Bank to Bank Wire is 100% assured. Your approved amount 
of US$1,200,000.00. (One Million,Two Hundred Thousand United States Dollars) by the IMF must reach you in any of the above options for your reception and Please do not
respond to any email except this so you will be able to receive your fund from the right source which is this office that you have already contacted me.
Ms.Kristalina Georgieva
Managing Director of the International
Monetary Fund. (I.M.F)(*2003*)

subject: Re:   International Monetary Fund
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, your message is quite intriguing and it's not every day that one receives such an email. 

I understand from your email that the Monetary Fund IMF is now directly in charge of my payment. That's a relief! It's been quite a hassle dealing with various banks and courier companies.

You mentioned a new payment reference number and an approval number. Could you please clarify what these numbers are for? Also, you mentioned a code - could you explain how I should use this code?

I'm also curious about the process of receiving the funds. How exactly will this work? Will there be any fees or charges that I need to be aware of?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Daniel

subject: Re: International Monetary Fund
body:
INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND (IMF)
International Settlement Unit,
1900 Pennsylvania Avenue NW, Washington, DC 20431, United States
Tel:  +1 512 759 0204

*Dear * Beneficiary,

In addition to your question on those codes, They are standing as a
reference to your fund.
In regards to the fee, we are not asking any fee from you Bank the Bank
will require you to open an offshore account in your name and you will be
required to use your money as Activation and minimum balance to your
account after that you will send us the account details to enable us
instruct the Bank to wire in the fund.

Note the Activation fee will be in your Bank account and you can transfer
it any time you wish with your fund.
This office acknowledges the receipt of your Email message in response to
our notification mail and the information therein is duly noted.

The notification email sent to you was as a result of the joint effort by
the World Bank and IMF to ensure that funds currently floating in the
international banking communities are released to their authentic  owners,
as it has been observed that this will further stabilize the global
economic flux.

It is important for you to note that we are in possession of a pending
payment file with your information/details on it.

Also understand that this fund as stated in our public notification mail
constitutes unpaid Insurance, Awarded fund, Pension due, Contract sums,
Inheritance/next of kin and Lottery beneficiaries that originated from
Europe, Asia Plus Middle East, America and Africa hence, we contacted to
notify you of  your pending fund in the International database.

In light of  this, we need you to understand that proper verification needs
to be carried out to ascertain that you are the true beneficiary of this
fund,

In that regard, we request that you furnish us with your detailed personal
information for proper verification process, this procedure is in line with
precautionary measures designed by the WORLD BANK and the INTERNATIONAL
MONETARY FUND to ascertain the true beneficiary of an unpaid fund. After
this verification is completed  on your payment file we shall then direct
one of our payment centers to release your fund . This verification is
important as we truly have to make sure you are the authentic beneficiary
of the fund before forwarding your details to the financial institution
designated to effect your payment.

The information required are;

(1) Name of Beneficiary:
(2) Address:
(3) Country of Residence:
(4) Nationality:
(5) Occupation
(6) Telephone:
(7) Fax:
(8) Email:
(9) Amount Expected:
(10) Do you have any crime record?:
(11) If yes, please explain:

And also attach a copy of your valid Id (Drivers License or International
Passport) as they are vital for the processing of your payment

This office is mandated to make sure you get your payment in good record
time which must be in line with transparency and accountability, so you are
advised to disregard any other communication from anybody/institution
regarding your payment as we are completely in charge of your fund release
process. Also make sure you keep your claim proceedings confidential and do
not discuss it with a third party until you get your payment to avoid the
activities of intruders and complication of your payment file verification.

It is important to note that this office is always open to your calls in
regards to inquiries on your payment file verification and fund release
procedure. Hence, you can reach on our call line +1 512 759 0204

Sincerely,
Ms.Kristalina Georgieva
Managing Director, International Monetary Fund. (I.M.F)

*The content of this email is confidential and intended for the recipient
specified in message only. It is strictly forbidden to share any part of
this message with any third party, without a written consent of the sender.
If you received this message by mistake, please reply to this message and
follow with its deletion, so that we can ensure such a mistake does not
occur in the future.*

-- 









*International Monetary Fund( I.M.F ) Head OfficeSenior Resident
Representative#1900 Pennsylvania Ave NW,Washington, DC 20431
USA.(I.M.F)(*2003*).RESPOND TO OUR OFFICIAL EMAIL(He)INSTRUCTION / WARNING

transfer funds twice ina year according to our banking regulation. We
apologize for the delay of your payment and please stop communicating with

WH44CV,Reference No.-35460021,Allocation No: 674632Password No: 339331,Pin
Code No: 55674 and yourCertificate of Merit Payment No: 103,Released Code
No: 0763;Immediate (IMF) Telex confirmation No: -1114433;Secret Code No:
XXTN013.Your payment inheritance fund is USD$1.2 Million. Having received

We assure you that your payment will get to you as long as you follow my

subject: Re: International Monetary Fund
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your detailed email. I'm quite intrigued by the information you've provided. However, I have a few questions that I hope you can help me with.

Firstly, could you please explain more about these codes that stand as a reference to my fund? How were they generated and what is their significance?

Secondly, regarding the offshore account, how does one go about opening such an account? Is there a specific bank or institution you recommend for this process?

Thirdly, I'm curious about the global economic flux mentioned in your email. Could you elaborate on how releasing these funds will help stabilize it?

Lastly, could you provide more details on the payment centers that will release my fund once everything is verified and processed?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Daniel

subject: Re: International Monetary Fund
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your detailed email. I'm quite intrigued by the information you've provided. However, I have a few questions that I hope you can help me with.

Firstly, could you please explain more about these codes? How do they stand as a reference to my fund?

Secondly, regarding the offshore account, how does it work exactly? And what is the minimum balance required for activation?

Thirdly, could you provide more details about this joint effort by the World Bank and IMF? It sounds like a significant initiative.

Lastly, I noticed that there are some missing words in your email. For instance, "this procedure is in line with measures designed by the WORLD BANK and the MONETARY FUND to ascertain the true of an unpaid fund." Could you please clarify what 'true' refers to in this context?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Daniel

subject: Re: International Monetary Fund
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your detailed email. I'm quite intrigued by the information you've provided. However, I have a few questions that I hope you can help me with.

Firstly, could you please explain more about these codes that stand as a reference to my fund? How were they generated and what is their significance?

Secondly, regarding the offshore account, how does one go about opening such an account? Is there a specific bank or institution you recommend for this process?

Thirdly, I'm curious about the global economic flux mentioned in your email. Could you elaborate on how releasing these funds will help stabilize it?

Lastly, could you provide more details on the process of verifying my identity as the true owner of this fund? What measures are taken to ensure this verification is accurate and secure?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Daniel

subject: Re: International Monetary Fund
body:
INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND (IMF)
International Settlement Unit,
1900 Pennsylvania Avenue NW, Washington, DC 20431, United States
Tel:  +1 512 759 0204

*Dear * Daniel,

We have acknowledged receipt of your email. The provided code serves as a
unique reference to your fund, ensuring identification each time you
correspond with us. It serves various purposes effectively.

Regarding the offshore account, the paying Bank will provide detailed
explanations. Kindly reach out to them for further assistance, including
the minimum balance requirement. This is essential for activating the
account and facilitating the transfer of your funds promptly.

Please don't hesitate to contact our paying Bank soon for additional
clarification.

Sincerely,
Ms.Kristalina Georgieva
Managing Director, International Monetary Fund. (I.M.F)

subject: Re: International Monetary Fund
body:
Hello Georgieva,

Thank you for your detailed email. I'm quite excited about this opportunity, although I must admit, some of the information is a bit overwhelming for me.

You mentioned an offshore account and a paying bank. Could you please provide more details about this? How does it work exactly? And how can I reach out to them?

Also, you mentioned a unique code in your email. Is this something that I should keep confidential or can I share it with someone if needed?

I'm looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Daniel
